name: Sausage Brawl
description:
Beat up your friends in this comedic fast-paced 2 player local multiplayer sausage brawler with 9 stage types! 16 stages! and 5 special stages!

Smash your head into the ground to release a powerful blast in order to knock your friends off.

With music by:

DaveJF

Ville Nousiainen

Requirements:

A keyboard.

A controller.
